thread.title: Canadian Solar to Attend 2015 ROTH Solar Symposium in Anaheim, California
thread.title_full: Canadian Solar to Attend 2015 ROTH Solar Symposium in Anaheim, California

title: Canadian Solar to Attend 2015 ROTH Solar Symposium in Anaheim, California
text:
Canadian Solar to Attend 2015 ROTH Solar Symposium in Anaheim, California Â» Science & Technology Published on 2015-09-14 02:17:42 Canadian Solar to Attend 2015 ROTH Solar Symposium in Anaheim, California -- GUELPH, Ontario, Sept. 11,    > GUELPH, Ontario , Sept. 11,   Canadian Solar Inc. (NASDAQ: CSIQ ), one of the world's largest solar power companies, today announced that it is scheduled to attend 2015 ROTH Solar Symposium Conference on Tuesday September 15, 2015 at the Anaheim Hilton hotel in Anaheim, California . During the conference, Mr. Michael G. Potter , Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer and Mr. Ed Job , Director of Investor Relations will be available to meet with institutional investors. About Canadian Solar Founded in 2001 in Canada , Canadian Solar is one of the world's largest and foremost solar power companies. As a leading manufacturer of solar photovoltaic modules and a provider of solar energy solutions, Canadian Solar has a geographically diversified pipeline of utility-scale power projects. In the past 14 years, Canadian Solar has successfully deployed over 11 GW of premium quality modules in over 70 countries around the world. Furthermore, Canadian Solar is one of the most bankable companies in the world, having been publically listed on NASDAQ since 2006. For additional information about the company, follow Canadian Solar on Facebook , Twitter , LinkedIn , or on the website . 
SOURCE Canadian Solar Inc.
